Info.title: Repertoire metadata
Info.description: Repertoire metadata written by AIRR Standards Python Library

study.study_title: Antibody repertoire RNA-seq throughout key stages of mouse B-cell development
study.study_description: We sought to investigate the extent of genetic and antigen-driven predetermination of antibody repertoires throughout B-cell development (pre-B cells, naive B cells, plasma cells). To this end, we used (i) an inbred model organism (mouse, C57BL/6J) to quantify genetic predetermination and (ii) cohort-stratification (4 cohorts: 1 untreated, 3 antigen-immunized) to quantify antigen-driven predetermination. To ensure generalizability of our research, we additionally sequenced naive B cells from Balb/c and pet shop mice.

sample.tissue_processing: Cells were sorted on a BD FACS Aria II and analyzed using FACS Diva software.
sample.sequencing_facility: Quantitative Genomics Facility, ETH Zurich, Basel

sample.tissue_processing: Cells were sorted on a BD FACS Aria II and analyzed using FACS Diva software.
sample.sequencing_facility: Quantitative Genomics Facility, ETH Zurich, Basel
